Pinyin1: bùyào wàngjì suǒmén 。
Translate1: Don't forget to lock the door.

Translate1: Tomorrow I will show you a science experiment.

Pinyin1: bié zài zhèlǐ xīyān 。
Translate1: Don't smoke here.

Pinyin1: dàhǎi yǒu xǔduō yǒuqù de shēngwù 。
Chinese1: 大海有许多有趣的生物。
Translate1: There are many interesting creatures in the sea.

Pinyin1: háizi men zài cāochǎngshàng wánshuǎ 。

Pinyin1: quánjiā yīqǐ qù jiāoyóu ， duōme kāixīn 。

Translate1: What a joy to go on an outing with the whole family.

Pinyin1: chūntiān lái le ， huādōukāi le 。
Translate1: Spring is here and the flowers are blooming.

Pinyin1: jīntiānxiàwǔ wǒyào cānjiā yīgè jùhuì 。
Chinese1: 今天下午我要参加一个聚会。
Translate1: I'm going to a party this afternoon.

Pinyin1: bùduàn de nǔlì ， cáinéng shíxiàn mèngxiǎng 。

Pinyin1: xīnnián dào le ， dàjiā gāi tuányuán le 。
Chinese1: 新年到了，大家该团圆了。
Translate1: The new year is here, and it's time for everyone to reunite.

Pinyin1: xuéxiào líjiā bùyuǎn ， kěyǐ bùxíng shàngxué 。

Translate1: The school is not far from home and you can walk to school.

Pinyin1: shànliáng de rén ， dàjiā dōu xǐhuan 。

Pinyin1: jīntiān hěn rè ， chūmén yào zhùyì fángshài 。
Chinese1: 今天很热，出门要注意防晒。
Translate1: It's hot today, so pay attention to sunscreen when you go out.

Pinyin1: qù bówùguǎn bā ， xīnshǎng yīxià wénhuà 。

Translate1: Go to a museum and enjoy the culture.

Pinyin1: jiànkāng yǐnshí shì hěn zhòngyào de 。

Pinyin1: nǐ jīntiān xūyào bǎ zhège gōngzuò zuò wán 。
Chinese1: 你今天需要把这个工作做完。

Pinyin1: bàba zhèngzài zhònghuā ， kànqǐlai hěn máng 。
Chinese1: 爸爸正在种花，看起来很忙。
Translate1: Dad is planting flowers and looks very busy.

Pinyin1: nǎxiē rén míngtiān néng yīqǐ qù yěcān ？

Translate1: Who can go to the picnic tomorrow?

Pinyin1: zūnzhòng biéren cáinéng lājìn bǐcǐ de jùlí 。
Chinese1: 尊重别人才能拉近彼此的距离。
Translate1: Respect for others is the only way to get closer to each other.

Pinyin1: wǒ zhèngzài zhǔnbèi jīntiān de jiémù 。
Chinese1: 我正在准备今天的节目。
Translate1: I'm preparing for today's program.

Pinyin1: tā jīntiān méiyǒu lái shàngkè 。

Pinyin1: qǐyè zhèngzài zhāopìn xīnrén 。

Translate1: This incident has attracted everyone's attention.

Pinyin1: zhíxíng shíyào jiāyǐ tiáozhěng 。

Translate1: What exactly are you trying to express?

Pinyin1: zhè zhēnshi tiāndà de cuòwù ！
Translate1: What a big mistake!

Pinyin1: méiyǒu rén kěyǐ zǔdǎng wǒ 。
Translate1: No one can stop me.

Pinyin1: wǒ bùxiǎng shīqù nǐ 。

Pinyin1: wǒhuì yǒngyuǎn ài nǐ 。
Translate1: I will love you forever.

Pinyin1: yǒu nǐ zài ， wǒ jiù yǒu zìxìn ！
Translate1: With you, I have confidence!

Pinyin1: nǐ yīdìng yào jiānqiáng ！
Translate1: You must be strong!

Pinyin1: yīqiè dōuhuì yǒu hǎo de jiéguǒ de ！

Translate1: Everything will work out!

Pinyin1: wǒhuì yǒngyuǎn péibàn nǐ ！
Translate1: I will always be with you!

Pinyin1: nǐ bùyào zǒng xiǎngzhe bàofù tāmen 。
Chinese1: 你不要总想着报复他们。
Translate1: You don't always want to get revenge on them.

Pinyin1: shénme dū huì guòqu de 。

Pinyin1: bù huīxīn ， jìxù jiāyóu bā ！
Translate1: Don't be discouraged, keep going!

Pinyin1: hòuzheliǎnpí ， yǒnggǎn miànduì 。
Translate1: Thick-skinned and brave.

Pinyin1: bùyào zǒng duì zìjǐ tài kēkè 。
Translate1: Don't always be too hard on yourself.

Pinyin1: nǐ yīnggāi zuò yīgè yǒu zhǔjiàn de rén ！

Pinyin1: bié ràng biéren cǎità nǐ 。

Pinyin1: yǒngyuǎn bùyào fàngqì xīwàng 。

Pinyin1: wǒmen huì yīqǐ qiánjìn 。

Pinyin1: zuò yīxiē nǐ mèngxiǎng zhōng de shì 。

Pinyin1: fāxiàn bìng tànsuǒ nǐ nèixīnshēnchù 。

Pinyin1: zǒuchū nǐ de shūshì qū ！

Pinyin1: bié ràng biéren dehuà zuǒyòu nǐ 。

Pinyin1: xiāngxìn nǐ zìjǐ bìng bǎochí nǐ de xìnxīn 。

Pinyin1: gǎnyú zuò zìjǐ ！

Pinyin1: shǐzhōng jìzhu ， bùyào xiàng mìngyùn dītóu 。

Chinese1: 只有勇于拼搏，才能成功。

Pinyin1: yīdìng yào yǒu zìxìn ！

Chinese1: 我去那家商店买过东西。
Translate1: I went to that store to buy something.

Pinyin1: tiānsè zhújiàn biànàn le 。

Pinyin1: wǒ měitiān chī liǎngdùn fàn 。

Translate1: I worked hard to learn Mandarin with my teacher.

Translate1: It's really hot today!

Pinyin1: wǒmen yǒu yīzhī xiǎogǒu 。

Pinyin1: wǒmen jīngcháng qù hǎitān sànbù 。

Pinyin1: xīngqītiān shàngwǔ wǒmen qù kàn diànyǐng 。

Pinyin1: wǒ gēge qù mǎi xīn xiézi le 。

Pinyin1: wǒ pǎo dé bǐ wǒ péngyou kuài 。

Pinyin1: wǒ mèimei yǒu yīzhī piàoliang de māo 。

Chinese1: 明天是我的生日，我很期待。
Translate1: Tomorrow is my birthday and I am looking forward to it.

Pinyin1: wǒmen zuótiān zài gōngyuán wányóuxì 。
Chinese1: 我们昨天在公园玩游戏。
Translate1: We played games in the park yesterday.

Pinyin1: zuótiānwǎnshàng wǒ hé tóngxué qù kàn diànyǐng le 。
Chinese1: 昨天晚上我和同学去看电影了。
Translate1: I went to the movies with my classmates last night.

Pinyin1: wǒ gěi nǐ mǎi yībēi bīng kāfēi 。
Translate1: I'll buy you an iced coffee.

Pinyin1: wǒhuì dài háizi qù dòngwùyuán 。
Translate1: I will take the children to the zoo.

Pinyin1: wǒmen qù hǎitān shàng fàngfēngzhēng 。
Translate1: Let's fly a kite on the beach.

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ xuéxí yīxiē xīn de hànzì 。
Chinese1: 我可以学习一些新的汉字。
Translate1: I can learn some new Chinese characters.

Pinyin1: shéi zài chànggē ？
Translate1: who is singing

Pinyin1: wǒmen zuótiān mǎi le yīxiē shíwù 。
Chinese1: 我们昨天买了一些食物。
Translate1: We bought some food yesterday.

Pinyin1: wǒmen míngtiān qù húbiān yěcān 。
Translate1: We will have a picnic by the lake tomorrow.

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ bāng nǐ liàngyīfú 。
Translate1: I can hang your clothes for you.

Pinyin1: wǒnéng hěnkuài dúwán zhè běnshū 。
Translate1: I can finish this book quickly.

Pinyin1: shìyǒu zhǔnbèi bǎ fángjiān shōushi yīxià 。
Chinese1: 室友准备把房间收拾一下。
Translate1: The roommate is going to tidy up the room.

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ qù línjūjiā bāngmáng xǐwǎn 。
Chinese1: 我可以去邻居家帮忙洗碗。
Translate1: I can go to a neighbor's house and help with the dishes.

Pinyin1: wǒ gēn bàba qù mǎi yīzhī māo 。
Translate1: My dad and I went to buy a cat.

Pinyin1: zuótiānwǎnshàng wǒ mǎi le yīxiē shuǐguǒ 。
Chinese1: 昨天晚上我买了一些水果。
Translate1: I bought some fruit last night.

Pinyin1: lǎoshī měicì dōuhuì bāng wǒ jiějuéwèntí 。
Chinese1: 老师每次都会帮我解决问题。
Translate1: The teacher will help me solve the problem every time.

Pinyin1: zhōumò wǒmen qù hǎibiān yóuwán 。
Translate1: We go to the beach on weekends.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ dào guǎngchǎng shàng tiàowǔ 。
Chinese1: 我们可以到广场上跳舞。
Translate1: We can dance in the square.

Pinyin1: wǒ lǎogong jīntiān yǒu shíjiān 。
Translate1: My husband has time today.

Pinyin1: wǒ xiān zuò yīxiē jiāwù ránhòu qù mǎicài 。
Chinese1: 我先做一些家务然后去买菜。
Translate1: I do some housework first and then go grocery shopping.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ qù dòngwùyuán kàn dòngwù 。
Chinese1: 我们可以去动物园看动物。
Translate1: We can go to the zoo to see animals.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ qù gōngyuán sànbù 。
Translate1: We can go for a walk in the park.

Pinyin1: zuótiānwǎnshàng de cài zhēn hǎochī ！
Translate1: The dish last night was delicious!

Pinyin1: māma zuò le yīxiē hǎochī de shíwù 。
Chinese1: 妈妈做了一些好吃的食物。
Translate1: Mom made some delicious food.

Pinyin1: wǒ de tóngxué zhōumò dōuhuì qù huàhuà 。
Chinese1: 我的同学周末都会去画画。
Translate1: My classmates will go to paint on weekends.

Pinyin1: zǎoshang wǒ gǎnjué hěn yǒu lìqì 。
Translate1: I feel energized in the morning.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ qù hǎibiān shōují bèiké 。
Chinese1: 我们可以去海边收集贝壳。
Translate1: We can go to the beach to collect shells.

Pinyin1: yīgè rén zài jiālǐ kànshū hěn shūfu 。
Chinese1: 一个人在家里看书很舒服。
Translate1: It is very comfortable to read a book at home alone.

Pinyin1: wǒ jiālǐ yǒu wǔzhǐ kěài de xiǎomāo 。
Chinese1: 我家里有五只可爱的小猫。
Translate1: There are five lovely kittens in my family.

Pinyin1: jīntiān shì xīngqītiān ！
Translate1: Today is Sunday!

Pinyin1: wǒmen jīntiān qù gòuwù bā ！
Translate1: Let's go shopping today!

Pinyin1: gōngyuán lǐ yǒu hěnduō piàoliang de huā 。
Chinese1: 公园里有很多漂亮的花。
Translate1: There are many beautiful flowers in the park.

Pinyin1: wǒmen qù cāntīng chī wǔcān bā 。
Translate1: Let's go to the restaurant for lunch.

Pinyin1: nǐ kěyǐ mǎi yīgè xīn de shūbāo 。
Chinese1: 你可以买一个新的书包。
Translate1: You can buy a new schoolbag.

Pinyin1: yùdàokùnnán shíyào lěngjìng chǔlǐ 。
Chinese1: 遇到困难时要冷静处理。
Translate1: Be calm when encountering difficulties.

Pinyin1: wǒ mèimei jīntiān yào qù hùwài shèyǐng 。
Chinese1: 我妹妹今天要去户外摄影。
Translate1: My sister is going outdoors for photography today.

Pinyin1: wǒ jīntiān bǎ kètīng shōushi dé hěn gānjìng 。
Chinese1: 我今天把客厅收拾得很干净。
Translate1: I cleaned up the living room today.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ qù páshān 。
Translate1: We can go climbing.

Pinyin1: wǒmen jīntiān zài xuéxiào xuéxí zhōngguó wénhuà 。
Chinese1: 我们今天在学校学习中国文化。
Translate1: We study Chinese culture at school today.

Pinyin1: wǒ jīntiān qù shāngdiàn mǎi le yījiàn yīfú 。
Chinese1: 我今天去商店买了一件衣服。
Translate1: I went to the store today to buy a dress.

Pinyin1: wǒ péngyou měige xīngqī dōuyào shàng wǔdǎo kè 。
Chinese1: 我朋友每个星期都要上舞蹈课。
Translate1: My friend has dance lessons every week.

Pinyin1: zuótiān zài gāosùgōnglù shàng wǒ kāidé hěnkuài 。
Chinese1: 昨天在高速公路上我开得很快。
Translate1: I was driving very fast on the highway yesterday.

Pinyin1: xiàwǔ wǒyào qù gěi péngyou jì yīfēngxìn 。
Chinese1: 下午我要去给朋友寄一封信。
Translate1: In the afternoon I am going to send a letter to a friend.

Pinyin1: tā hěn shàncháng yóuyǒng 。
Translate1: He's good at swimming.

Pinyin1: tā zhèngzài kàndiànshì 。
Translate1: She's watching TV.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào gēng duō de shíjiān 。
Translate1: We need more time.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ yīqǐ qù dǎlánqiú 。
Chinese1: 我们可以一起去打篮球。
Translate1: We can play basketball together.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi bǎohùhuánjìng 。
Translate1: We should protect the environment.

Pinyin1: tāmen zài hǎibiān dùjià 。
Translate1: They're vacationing at the beach.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan huàhuà 。
Translate1: She likes painting.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào gēng duō de shíwù 。
Translate1: We need more food.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ yīqǐ qù diàoyú 。
Translate1: We can go fishing together.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi zhēnxī shíguāng 。
Translate1: We should cherish our time.
